title: Where can I buy K-pop albums for wholesale? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A Where can I buy K-pop albums for wholesale? I wish I knew. I get most of my music off of google play music and the like, which is notorious for not having full albums. I’d be tempted to buy the CD’s, but I’ve always had an issue with paying the prices asked (especially the inflated imports prices) for an album where I may not like much more than 2 or 3 songs out of 10+.
I recommend u visit this site K-POP CDs Online Shop the site has lots of - pop Cds&goods:)
